channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Moment of Proof
channel.desc: A jacket recovered from a suspect's home is found to have the DNA of two stabbing victims on it as police hunt for the person behind a series of seemingly unprovoked attacks. There's little for police to go on after a man is left to die in the street, and when the attacker strikes again, they are in a race against time to find the person responsible.
